newsitem.title: LEBANON: Beirut T-bill issue raises 307.5 bln pounds.
newsitem.headline: Beirut T-bill issue raises 307.5 bln pounds.

text.p: Lebanon's weekly treasury bill issue of January 2 raised 307.5 billion Lebanese pounds, the finance ministry said on Monday.
The previous issue raised 321.2 billion pounds.
The new issue posted a nominal surplus of subscription against maturity of 85.9 billion pounds. It raised the following amounts (in billions of pounds, previous week in brackets):
The Lebanese pound closed at 1,551.75 to the U.S. dollar on Monday from 1,552 a week earlier and 1,595 a year ago.
